name: Temple of Life
description:
NOTE:

The WebGL version is the post-jam version which was design to make the game be a little more winnable and address some minor potential game breaking bugs. However, the WebGL os unable to load all the textures and there's still a UI bug in this new version still. :)

Description
You have stumbled upon a temple that demands you pay with your life in order to get the keys that grant you access into the temple. You try to run but the guardian at the entrance intimidates you so you decide to go in. 

Can you make it passed all the floors of the Temple of Life with out perishing?

Controls

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Use/Pick Up Orb Key: E, Left Mouse Button
  • Pause Menu: ESC

How to play

  • Spend your life wisely for keys to ease your trials
  • Find the terminal that activates the exit pad
  • Make your way back to the pad to finish the level
  • There are a total of 4 levels to complete 

3D Models
This time we did not have a 3D artist so we opted for assets from the unity asset store
We are opting out of graphics rating because of this but if you like the artwork, please let our Graphics Artist know :D

P.S. the Linux version is untested...hope it works for you :)
